column4: can anyone help we me with a simple question. Is metacity just a decorator for windows? And Gtk 2.x? which parts it actually modifies?

petskull: what is metacity? can you explain me better? the problem is that sometimes i download a theme with just GTK 2.X and just modifies my start menu (panel). I just wanted to know who plays each role in the theme (i know about emerald and compiz, but i am not using them)
pici: do i need the gtk theme changer installed to automatically change it? why sometime, even putting the themes inside the right folder, i cant have the  "Appearence" of ubuntu recognizing it?
